content: What happens when there are multiple CDs hooks cards (from different applications) all triggered by the same patient hook? How do they get queued and displayed. In what order and priority. I'm happy to get a link to a pre-existing answer if there is one.
I don't believe that there are any rules about this - it's entirely at the discretion of the client
Hey Guys - the UI presentation of the cards isn't dictated by the spec, but note that a card's indicator value is intended to help with this type of concern.
Thanks @Grahame Grieve and @Isaac Vetter. That was helpful.
